set.name: DMC-65 The Movie Deck: Ultra Fire Spirits

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Flame Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't attack. ■ At the start of your turn, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Awaken—At the start of your turn, you may shuffle 5 Fire Birds in your graveyard into your deck. If you do, flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-65 The Movie Deck: Ultra Fire Spirits

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Destroy this creature. Then you may choose a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone and put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-65 The Movie Deck: Ultra Fire Spirits

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from among them into your hand, then put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-65 The Movie Deck: Ultra Fire Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 4 or less. ■ Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Fire Birds. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-65 The Movie Deck: Ultra Fire Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-65 The Movie Deck: Ultra Fire Spirits

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Flame Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your psychic creatures that cost 5 or less can't be blocked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Set

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
